data.name: Maniacs
data.detailed_description:
About this game
In this game you are present behind the lighthouse. When you cross the Bridge then your game start.
Now you can hear an horror sound and musics. There are many enemy are present in that island so be carefull and there Boss are present in this island and they have powerfull weapon.This game also have Nightvision camera.

FEATURE
1-You can control Sound, Sound SFX, Brightness, Levels etc.
2-When you start game there have a small animated intro about this game.
3-Search on island for keys to unlock house and room doors.
4-You can choose you level
-Easy
-Medium
-Hard
5-You can save your gameplay.

CONTROLS
Also you can find controls on Readme FIle.

Keyborad
1 - Characters Control
W - Forward
S - Backward
A - Left
D - Right

2 - Others Control
O - Options menu
I - Inventory menu
F - Flashlight
N - Nightvision camera
E - Pickup item

Mouse
Left Button - Fire
Right Button - Target

data.short_description: You can play this game only FPP mode.There have many graphics options in this game which you can use it.This game is a mixture of horror and action those people like horror or action game can play this game. Enjoy it,

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 630
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For low-end devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-10400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For High-End devices.

highlighted.name: if you are killed the boss then you are king of Maniacs.
